name: Coz
description:
MY WEBSITE I RECOMMEND PLAYING COZ HERE!  https://www.handleyshelton.com/

**ATTENTION EP 2 IS OUT **  Hello I am posting this merely as a test. I would love some feedback. The idea is to do a weekly update to this story told through bitsy games kinda like a web comic but told through short game like experiences. my main interest is would people be interested and if so should i continue?
